text: Caroebe () is a municipality located in the southeast of the state of Roraima in Brazil. Its population is 7,400 (as of 2008) and its area is 12,066 km². It is the easternmost municipality in Roraima and the only one to border the state of Pará. ==Climate== Caroebe has a tropical rainforest climate (Af) with moderate rainfall from September to March and heavy rainfall from April to August. ==References == Category:Municipalities in Roraima Category:Populated places established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in Brazil
title: Caroebe
